app.description: Instantly generate quizzes from your documents or images using AI.

errors.unknownExtraction: An unknown error occurred during text extraction.
errors.unknownQuizGeneration: An unknown error occurred during quiz generation.
errors.unsupportedFile: Unsupported file type. Please upload images, a PDF, or a DOCX file.
errors.pdfRender: Failed to render PDF. It might be corrupted or unsupported.
errors.fileProcess: Could not process the file. Please try again.
errors.mixedFiles: Please upload either multiple images or a single document (PDF/DOCX).
errors.tooManyImages: You can upload up to 5 images at a time.
errors.tooManyDocuments: Only one document (PDF or DOCX) can be uploaded at once.
errors.singleDocumentOnly: A PDF or DOCX must be uploaded alone, not with other files.
errors.pdfPageLimit: PDFs are limited to 15 pages. Please upload a shorter document.

fileUpload.fileTypes: Up to 5 images, or one PDF/DOCX (max 15 pages)
fileUpload.useCamera: Use camera to take a photo
fileUpload.cameraDescription: Capture a new picture using your phone or tablet camera.

quizOptions.title: Customize Your Quiz
quizOptions.description: We've analyzed your document. Now, let's set up the quiz.
quizOptions.contentReadyMessage: Text successfully generated. Select the type of Quiz.

quizDisplay.description: Answer the following questions to the best of your ability.
quizDisplay.allAnswered: Please answer all questions before submitting.
